subject: Football
lead_paragraph: A son of Philadelphia Eagles Coach Andy Reid was sent to state prison after admitting he smuggled 89 prescription pills into a county jail. Garrett Reid, 25, pleaded guilty to drug-smuggling charges and faces a minimum of two years in state prison. His 23-year old brother, Britt, is serving a jail sentence of 8 to 23 months for pointing a gun at a driver.
